name: Ext_R3_ValueSet_co_in_valueSet
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ValueSet.compose.include.valueSet for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ValueSet.compose.include.valueSet from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Select only contents included in this value set
element.definition: Selects concepts found in this value set. This is an absolute URI that is a reference to ValueSet.url.
element.comment: `ValueSet.compose.include.valueSet` maps to R4 `ValueSet.compose.include.valueSet`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
